title._content: Image taken from page 133 of 'The Charles Dickens Birthday Book. Compiled and edited by his eldest daughter [i.e. Mary Dickens]. With five illustrations by his youngest daughter [i.e. Kate Perugini]'

description._content: Image taken from: Title: "The Charles Dickens Birthday Book. Compiled and edited by his eldest daughter [i.e. Mary Dickens]. With five illustrations by his youngest daughter [i.e. Kate Perugini]", "Selections, Adaptations and Abridgments from two or more works" Author: Dickens, Charles Contributor: D., M. Contributor: DICKENS, Mary. Contributor: P., K. Contributor: PERUGINI, Katherine Elizabeth Macready. Shelfmark: "British Library HMNTS 12274.b.10." Page: 133 Place of Publishing: London Date of Publishing: 1882 Publisher: Chapman & Hall Issuance: monographic Identifier: 000932618 Note: The colours, contrast and appearance of these illustrations are unlikely to be true to life. They are derived from scanned images that have been enhanced for machine interpretation and have been altered from their originals.
